AvatarLaezelFinalChoice_42.text: *The red dragon appears, poised to carry you into the skies. You will fight for githyanki liberation as a Warrior of the Comet.*
AvatarLaezelFinalChoice_42.context: CinematicNodeContext: A dragon flies to Lae'zel. She mounts itInternalNodeContext: Orpheus is defeated, not ceremorphed Laezel Avatar

SoloFates_Wyll_3.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_3.text: *The dawn greets you warmly, as if it knows of your victory. The Netherbrain is fallen, and the parasites have gone quiet.*

SoloFates_Wyll_21.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_21.text: *But you know there is work yet to be done. The people will be shaken, the city will hurt.*

SoloFates_Wyll_42.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_42.text: *You are the Heart of the Gate, a rightful Grand Duke. Your next step determines the leader you'll become.*

SoloFates_Wyll_48.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_48.text: Step out at your father's side. Proclaim your victory, and bask in the cheers.

SoloFates_Wyll_38.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_38.text: *Your father is the most beloved man of all Baldur's Gate. He will honour his only son in raucous celebration.*

SoloFates_Wyll_96.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_96.text: Step forward with pride. Proclaim your victory, and bask in the cheers.

SoloFates_Wyll_7.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_7.text: *Ulder Ravengard is fallen. The people will honour his son, saviour of Baldur's Gate, in raucous celebration.*

SoloFates_Wyll_86.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_86.text: *They'll gawk at your horns, at your infernal visage. But soon, they'll warmly welcome you as a Grand Duke.*

SoloFates_Wyll_43.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_43.text: *Just as she promised, Mizora's dissolved your warlock skills. But you are confident nonetheless, for you embody the four pillars of power: Courage, insight, strategy, justice.*

SoloFates_Wyll_74.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_74.text: *What will the histories tell of Grand Duke Wyll Ravengard? Will you be called a man of mercy, or a tyrant? Will Baldur's Gate glow as a jewel, or be made a mockery?*

SoloFates_Wyll_11.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_11.text: *Will your patron Mizora tarnish your legacy before the Hells snatch your soul?*

SoloFates_Wyll_109.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_109.text: *For now, you take a breath, sure of one thing over all others: You are a man of your own making.*

SoloFates_Wyll_44.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_44.text: *Going forth, you will prove you embody the four pillars of power: Courage, insight, strategy, justice.*

SoloFates_Wyll_54.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_54.text: The citizens need to grieve. Gather them, and mourn the fallen.

SoloFates_Wyll_110.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_110.text: *You will bow your head for Grand Duke Stelmane - and the countless other victims of Gortash, Orin, and Ketheric, the Dead Three's chosen.*

SoloFates_Wyll_68.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_68.text: *You will bow your head for Grand Duke Stelmane. Your father, Ulder Ravengard. And all the victims of Gortash, Orin, and Ketheric, the Dead Three's chosen.*

SoloFates_Wyll_61.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_61.text: *Then you can begin restoring the people's trust in their leaders.*

SoloFates_Wyll_65.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_65.text: Approach the remaining patriars and dukes, and decide the best course of action.

SoloFates_Wyll_14.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_14.text: *With your father at your side, you've no doubts that you can restore the Council of Four and the Parliament of Peers.*

SoloFates_Wyll_89.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_89.text: *With all the important players in place, you'll present a united front to the people.*

SoloFates_Wyll_69.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_69.text: *You descend from beloved stock. You've no doubts that you can restore the Council of Four and the Parliament of Peers.*

SoloFates_Wyll_123.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_123.text: Open the gates to all refugees. Baldur's Gate will be sanctuary to all who need it.

SoloFates_Wyll_101.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_101.text: *If your city is to flourish, you must first cut out the tumours Gortash left behind.*

SoloFates_Wyll_117.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_117.text: *You will welcome all comers, regardless of ancestry or appearance. And you will dismiss any Flaming Fist who dares argue against it.*

SoloFates_Wyll_20.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_20.text: Organise a military parade and march the Flaming Fist through the streets.

SoloFates_Wyll_102.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_102.text: *A show of force will reveal you as a mighty commander, one who will keep order when enemies knock upon the gates.*

SoloFates_Wyll_120.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_120.text: *The people will gawk at your horns, at your infernal visage. But soon, they'll warmly welcome you as a Grand Duke.*

SoloFates_Wyll_51.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_51.text: *But you know your work has just begun. Even now, you can feel the heat of the Hells. It is time for a culling.*

SoloFates_Wyll_66.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_66.text: *What will be your first act as Blade of Avernus?*

SoloFates_Wyll_26.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_26.text: Find Mizora, and make her pay for what she did to you.

SoloFates_Wyll_125.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_125.text: *Mizora treated you as a pet. She made your soul a mere plaything, and bid you choose between your father and your freedom.*

SoloFates_Wyll_29.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_29.text: *She's dissolved your warlock skills, just as she promised. But Ansur has blessed you as the Heart of the Gate.*

SoloFates_Wyll_122.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_122.text: *You embody the four pillars of power: Courage, insight, strategy, and justice.*

SoloFates_Wyll_84.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_84.text: *You will track down the blasted devil. And you will tear her wings and cleave her infernal flesh until her screams are lost in the fires.*

SoloFates_Wyll_12.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_12.text: Train in the bow and the sword, now that Mizora's taken all your powers.

SoloFates_Wyll_98.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_98.text: *Mizora's dissolved your warlock skills, just as she promised. But Ansur has blessed you as the Heart of the Gate.*

SoloFates_Wyll_31.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_31.text: *You will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back. You don't need the Hells' gifts to be mighty.*

SoloFates_Wyll_49.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_49.text: *From there, you choose the road to follow. The Blade of Avernus, a man of his own making.*

SoloFates_Wyll_52.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_52.text: Consult Mizora. She can point the way to your first infernal victim.

SoloFates_Wyll_94.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_94.text: *Like it or not, you are still chained to Mizora. You can't risk killing a devil whose loyalty is to her mistress, Zariel.*

SoloFates_Wyll_76.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_76.text: *With her blessing, you will fell one fiend, then another. The disloyal will tremble at your sight as you tear your way through Avernus.*

SoloFates_Wyll_124.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_124.text: *Your thoughts turn to your pact. Will Mizora ever stand in your way - and if so, will you dare resist?*

SoloFates_Wyll_1.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_1.text: *How soon will your soul be snatched for the Hells' army?*

SoloFates_Wyll_34.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_34.text: Scout for devils and demons hiding on the Coast and destroy them.

SoloFates_Wyll_4.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_4.text: *You will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back. You don't need the Hells' gifts to be mighty.*

SoloFates_Wyll_18.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_18.text: *Under your watch, no demon will harm the people of the Sword Coast, and no wardevil will set it aflame.*

SoloFates_Wyll_56.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_56.text: *Fiends will see the Blade of Avernus and tremble.*

SoloFates_Wyll_115.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_115.text: *You take a deep breath, sure of one thing over all others: You are a man of your own making.*

SoloFates_Wyll_83.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_83.text: *Avernus' powers still course through you. You will turn them against its own creatures.*

SoloFates_Wyll_9.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_9.text: *Your thoughts turn to Mizora. Will she stand in your way - and if so, will you dare resist?*

SoloFates_Wyll_5.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_5.text: *How soon will your soul be snatched for the Hells' army?*

SoloFates_Wyll_113.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_113.text: *For now, you have no answers. But you do have a pledge:*

SoloFates_Wyll_8.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_8.text: Descend to the Hells. Strike down each and every devil and demon you can.

SoloFates_Wyll_24.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_24.text: *You will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back. You don't need the Hells' gifts to be mighty.*

SoloFates_Wyll_15.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_15.text: *Fiends will tremble at your sight as you tear your way through Avernus. You will take their horns and tails as your trophies.*

SoloFates_Wyll_64.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_64.text: *Under your watch, no demon will harm the people of the Sword Coast, and no wardevil will set it aflame.*

SoloFates_Wyll_41.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_41.text: *Fiends will tremble at your sight as you tear your way through Avernus. You will take their horns and tails as your trophies.*

SoloFates_Wyll_111.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_111.text: *Under your watch, no demon will harm the people of the Sword Coast, and no wardevil will set it aflame.*

SoloFates_Wyll_37.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_37.text: Forget Avernus for now. Patrol the frontiers, seeking people to help.

SoloFates_Wyll_39.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_39.text: *You embody the four pillars of power: Courage, insight, strategy, and justice.*

SoloFates_Wyll_107.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_107.text: *You will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back. You don't need the Hells' gifts to be mighty.*

SoloFates_Wyll_53.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_53.text: *The people may not welcome you as a hero. They may see only a devil, frightening and despicable.*

SoloFates_Wyll_78.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_78.text: *But still, you'll persevere. You won't aid them for the glory. You'll aid them because it's right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_114.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_114.text: *Avernus' powers still course through you. You will continue to use them to help those who can't help themselves.*

SoloFates_Wyll_79.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_79.text: *They may not welcome you as a hero. They may see only a devil, frightening and despicable.*

SoloFates_Wyll_27.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_27.text: *But still, you'll persevere. You won't aid them for the glory. You'll aid them because it's right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_97.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_97.text: *Your thoughts turn to Mizora. Will she stand in your way - and if so, will you dare resist?*

SoloFates_Wyll_2.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_2.text: *How soon will your soul be snatched for the Hells' army?*

SoloFates_Wyll_45.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_45.text: *For now, you have no answers. But you do have a pledge:*

SoloFates_Wyll_62.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_62.text: *Under your watch, no monster will harm the people of the Sword Coast.*

SoloFates_Wyll_58.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_58.text: *But you know your work has just begun. The people need a champion. They need the Blade of Frontiers.*

SoloFates_Wyll_60.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_60.text: Find Mizora, and make her pay for what she did to you.

SoloFates_Wyll_47.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_47.text: *She's dissolved your warlock skills, just as she promised. But you will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back.*

SoloFates_Wyll_88.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_88.text: Hunt. Slay monsters and dangerous beasts before they can cause havoc.

SoloFates_Wyll_121.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_121.text: *You embody the four pillars of power: Courage, insight, strategy, and justice.*

SoloFates_Wyll_23.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_23.text: *You will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back. You don't need the Hells' gifts to be mighty.*

SoloFates_Wyll_93.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_93.text: *You'll fell great beasts and monsters. You'll be hailed as a hero. And you'll march forth with pride, knowing you've earned the right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_50.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_50.text: *Mizora's dissolved your warlock skills, just as she promised. But you will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back.*

SoloFates_Wyll_75.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_75.text: *You don't need the Hells' gifts to be mighty.*

SoloFates_Wyll_119.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_119.text: *You'll fell great beasts and monsters. You'll be hailed as a hero. And you'll always wonder if you've earned the right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_91.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_91.text: *You'll fell great beasts and monsters. You'll be hailed as a hero. And you'll march forth with pride, knowing you've earned the right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_71.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_71.text: *Your thoughts turn to Mizora. Will she stand in your way - and if so, will you dare resist?*

SoloFates_Wyll_36.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_36.text: *How soon will your soul be snatched for the Hells' army?*

SoloFates_Wyll_72.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_72.text: *For now, there's one thing you can be sure of: The Blade of Frontiers is a man of his own making.*

SoloFates_Wyll_92.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_92.text: *You'll fell great beasts and monsters. You'll be hailed as a hero. And you'll always wonder if you've earned the right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_90.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_90.text: Patrol the frontiers, seeking people to help.

SoloFates_Wyll_10.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_10.text: *When the tyrannised and the tormented cry out, you will listen. No one should suffer at the hands of man or monster.*

SoloFates_Wyll_100.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_100.text: *Mizora's dissolved your warlock skills, just as she promised. But Ansur has blessed you as the Heart of the Gate.*

SoloFates_Wyll_55.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_55.text: *Mizora's dissolved your warlock skills, just as she promised. But you will triumph with a sword in your hand and a bow at your back.*

SoloFates_Wyll_30.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_30.text: Join the efforts to restore peace to Baldur's Gate.

SoloFates_Wyll_16.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Wyll_16.text: Help your father restore peace to Baldur's Gate.

SoloFates_Wyll_103.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_103.text: *The citizens of Baldur's Gate will welcome Ravengard's son with open arms.*

SoloFates_Wyll_28.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_28.text: *They will call you a hero. And you'll march forth with pride, knowing you've earned the right.*

SoloFates_Wyll_59.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_59.text: *From there, you choose the road to follow. The Blade of Frontiers, a man of his own making.*

SoloFates_Wyll_104.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Wyll_104.text: *They will call you a hero. And you'll always wonder if you've earned the right.*

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_3.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers approaches a row of flickering candles. One burns brighter than the others. He takes the flame upon his bony fingertip and speaks to it. It flickers, alive.NodeContext: Withers approaches a row of flickering candles. One burns brighter than the others. He takes the flame upon his bony fingertip and speaks to it. It flickers, alive.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: Thou hast slept so long I feared thou might never wake. Dangerous, in this place beyond the Beyond.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.text: A holding place. Somewhere safe. Thou hast slept a long while - so long I feared thou mightest never wake.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: But thou hast stirred just in time - thy old companions hath regathered. They will not hear thee, but thou canst bear witness.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.speaker: Karlach
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.text: My companions? I can see them? How long has it been?

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: Just long enough. Their stories have marched on, since thy great victory - as inevitable as time itself. Let us observe.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_0.speaker: Karlach
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_0.text: Wait - the City of Judgement? How long will I stay there? And how long have I been asleep?

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_9.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_9.text: I have thee now, my child. And we have much to discuss. But first - let us linger a little in the land of the living.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.text: Great stories have thee woven - and more have sprung out of the inevitable time since thy great victory. Observe.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.speaker: Karlach
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.text: They're alive. I'm dead. Let's leave it at that.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: Thou presumeth a binary that might not be, Karlach. Come - let us observe which stories have spun from thy great victory.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: Indeed. His story has marched on since thy great victory - as inevitable as time itself. Let us observe.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_2.text: Indeed. Her story has marched on since thy great victory - as inevitable as time itself. Let us observe.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Karlach
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: I hear you - but I don't know who or what I am.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: Hadst  thou slept much longer, oblivion might have claimed your memories entirely. They will return to thee, Karlach - in fact, let us jog them.

WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.speaker: Withers
WithersGathersCompanions_KarlachAvatar_1.text: Thou hast stirred just in time to bear witness - thy old companions have regathered.

RomanceFates_Wyll_174.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_174.text: My shining star. Since I've known you, we've shed more blood than could ever fill the Chionthar. The wounds we sustained were the testament to our might.

RomanceFates_Wyll_235.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_235.text: But last night, I swear to you - your touch healed every one of my bruises and wiped away every scar.

RomanceFates_Wyll_17.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_17.text: *A moment passes. Wylls eyes glance up to his horns.*
RomanceFates_Wyll_17.context: CinematicNodeContext: A moment passes. Wylls eyes glance upwards.

RomanceFates_Wyll_169.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_169.text: - and in more ways than one.

RomanceFates_Wyll_150.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_150.text: When Mizora drained my warlock powers, it was if a blizzard froze me through.

RomanceFates_Wyll_119.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_119.text: Then you reignited my fires. When I'm at your side, I want for nothing.

RomanceFates_Wyll_226.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_226.text: *Sigh* If only last night could have lasted forever. But if I'm to be a Grand Duke, I've got to greet the people and gain their trust.

RomanceFates_Wyll_95.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_95.text: First, we mourn. We bow our heads for the fallen, and honour them by pledging peace.

RomanceFates_Wyll_263.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_263.text: Next, we heal the city. We restore our broken buildings, stone by stone. We restore faith in each other, one good turn at a time.

RomanceFates_Wyll_240.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_240.text: After that, well - it's up to us to decide. Any ideas?

RomanceFates_Wyll_48.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_48.text: A grand wedding is in order. I want to show off my groom to the city.

RomanceFates_Wyll_195.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_195.text: And a magnificent ball, I presume, for dancing the night away. You dressed to the nines, me in the finest uniform I can convince father to lend me.

RomanceFates_Wyll_77.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_77.text: And a magnificent ball, I presume, for dancing the night away. You wear your finest, and I'll look for one of father's dress uniforms.

RomanceFates_Wyll_218.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_218.text: How could I ever refuse you?

RomanceFates_Wyll_153.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_153.text: I'd like to start a family.

RomanceFates_Wyll_12.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_12.text: Ha! You've already thought about a little Ravengard running around, have you?

RomanceFates_Wyll_274.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_274.text: I'd like that. So would father, I bet. A nipper to bear his name, learn the pillars. Courage, insight, strategy, justice.

RomanceFates_Wyll_186.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_186.text: I'd like that. Someone to carry our name, learn the four pillars. If only father -

RomanceFates_Wyll_261.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_261.text: Well. Father would have loved having a grandchild. I know we'll raise a family worthy of his name.

RomanceFates_Wyll_76.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_76.text: Open the gates and welcome every last refugee who seeks sanctuary.

RomanceFates_Wyll_223.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_223.text: My star. The parasites have barely withered, your heart still hurts for them.

RomanceFates_Wyll_260.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_260.text: Let it be done. The Jewel of the Coast will shine ever bright, welcoming the weak and the weary, from wherever they hail.

RomanceFates_Wyll_157.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_157.text: If father were here... he'd be so proud of you. Proud of us.

RomanceFates_Wyll_37.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_37.text: What a joy, this life we're about to make, this story we're about to write - every chapter more thrilling than the last.

RomanceFates_Wyll_252.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_252.text: *You detect the slightest hint of sorrow behind Wyll's words. His diabolical patron and the torturous fate that awaits him are never far from his mind.*

RomanceFates_Wyll_85.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_85.text: I hope we never have to turn to the final page.

RomanceFates_Wyll_198.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_198.text: Declare your authority. March the Flaming Fist through the streets.

RomanceFates_Wyll_249.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_249.text: And why not name myself Archduke while I'm at it, maybe build some steel automatons to watch over the gates?

RomanceFates_Wyll_42.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_42.text: I'm not Gortash. I don't want to instil fear, I want to instil hope. Hope for a bountiful future, hope for a life free of tyranny and torment -

RomanceFates_Wyll_275.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_275.text: - hope for leaders that won't turn their backs to suffering.

RomanceFates_Wyll_116.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_116.text: It's the least we can give them: a future worth looking forward to.

RomanceFates_Wyll_215.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_215.text: An old-fashioned monster hunt, just the two of us.

RomanceFates_Wyll_66.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_66.text: There they are - the great champion of Baldur's Gate. I'll gather the snares, you can fletch the arrows.

RomanceFates_Wyll_189.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_189.text: A duke I'm soon to be - but the Blade's heart is never far from the frontiers.

RomanceFates_Wyll_51.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_51.text: *Sigh* If only last night could have lasted forever. How are you feeling, my darling?

RomanceFates_Wyll_276.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_276.text: Not good. I don't have long now.

RomanceFates_Wyll_75.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_75.text: Karlach... is there really no other way? Now that you've reached the end of the line, do you still refuse to return to Avernus? To live?

RomanceFates_Wyll_49.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_49.text: Raphael's set his sights on Zariel's throne. She'll be too busy fighting him to pursue you.

RomanceFates_Wyll_59.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_59.text: I can't. I'm responsible for Baldur's Gate. She needs me - desperately, now more than ever. I can't abandon her.

RomanceFates_Wyll_4.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_4.text: But I can't abandon you either. Return to Avernus - for now - and I'll join you once the city's been put to rights after this disaster.

RomanceFates_Wyll_160.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_160.text: All right, Wyll. All right. I'll go.

RomanceFates_Wyll_279.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_279.text: Then this is goodbye. For now. Until we meet again, my love - I'll think of you every day. Now go. Live. You deserve that much.

RomanceFates_Wyll_32.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_32.text: No. I won't go back. I can't. Anything but that.

RomanceFates_Wyll_244.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_244.text: I'd rather die in my home than live - barely - in the place I hate. All I want is to see the sky one last time.

RomanceFates_Wyll_170.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_170.text: Oh, my love. I wish I could understand. But I respect your wishes. If this is your time, I will stand by your side.

RomanceFates_Wyll_251.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_251.text: Maybe you're right. Maybe I should go back.

RomanceFates_Wyll_100.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_100.text: You won't be alone. I need to set Baldur's Gate to rights after this disaster, but once she's stable, I could join you. Hunt out devils - real devils - together.

RomanceFates_Wyll_0.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_0.text: I'm fine. Let's talk about the future.

RomanceFates_Wyll_175.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_175.text: What future, Karlach? A future without you in it is no future at all. Is there really no other way?

RomanceFates_Wyll_239.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_239.text: Now that you've reached the end of the line, do you still refuse to return to Avernus? To live?

RomanceFates_Wyll_140.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_140.text: Try to contain the inferno threatening to consume you.

RomanceFates_Wyll_202.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_202.text: I see it in your eyes. The time is near.

RomanceFates_Wyll_117.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_117.text: *A moment passes. The corners of Wyll's mouth turn downwards before he smiles again.*
RomanceFates_Wyll_117.context: CinematicNodeContext: A moment passes. The corners of Wyll's mouth turn downwards before he smiles again.

RomanceFates_Wyll_166.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_166.text: - and I've got you to thank for it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_184.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_184.text: Through you, I've been born anew.

RomanceFates_Wyll_92.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_92.text: There's something I need to ask you. Something terrible, something greedy, something unreasonable.

RomanceFates_Wyll_138.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_138.text: I'm the Blade of Avernus. I swore to cleanse the Hells of the devils that threaten the Coast. And I know my first target:

RomanceFates_Wyll_208.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_208.text: I won't let her claim one more soul, slay one more victim. I'm going to make my way to the Hells and tear the horns right off her damned head.

RomanceFates_Wyll_132.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_132.text: I want you to join me. A reasonable person would say 'no'. I still want you to say 'yes'.

RomanceFates_Wyll_45.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_45.text: I couldn't be more ready. Let's descend to the Hells and kill Mizora.

RomanceFates_Wyll_109.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_109.text: A revenge quest? You're better than this, Wyll.

RomanceFates_Wyll_121.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_121.text: It's not about me. It's about every desperate soul Mizora will recruit to the Blood War, every life she snuffs out on Zariel's whims.

RomanceFates_Wyll_9.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_9.text: I want you to see my blade slice her wings off her back, to hear her groans as she dissolves into ash.

RomanceFates_Wyll_96.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_96.text: Are you sure you're ready? Mizora drained you of your powers.

RomanceFates_Wyll_141.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_141.text: Courage. Insight. Strategy. Justice. The four pillars of power. Not an eldritch blast to be found.

RomanceFates_Wyll_207.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_207.text: Father trained me in the sword and the bow. They'll have to sustain me.

RomanceFates_Wyll_55.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_55.text: Please let her go. For me, for us, for the good of Faerûn.

RomanceFates_Wyll_64.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_64.text: *Sigh.* I must have played this conversation in my head a dozen times this tenday, and practised how I'd say 'no'.

RomanceFates_Wyll_135.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_135.text: But I can't. Not when I know deep down that you're right.

RomanceFates_Wyll_65.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_65.text: Forget Mizora. The people of the Coast call to the Blade and his star. Are you ready to be their hero?

RomanceFates_Wyll_7.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_7.text: This is where we part ways, Wyll.

RomanceFates_Wyll_144.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_144.text: I - I don't know what to say. I was sure we'd be carving out a future together.

RomanceFates_Wyll_56.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_56.text: Perhaps one day you'll change your mind - but if you won't, at least know this:

RomanceFates_Wyll_209.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_209.text: Wherever you go, you take my heart with you. So strong is my love that not even a devil could break it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_278.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_278.text: I'm sorry. The next we meet, my blade will stained with Mizora's blood.

RomanceFates_Wyll_44.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_44.text: Let's do it, then. I'll join you in the Hells and help kill Mizora.

RomanceFates_Wyll_80.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_80.text: All these years as the Blade - I've been called a champion. A hero. A legend. Names I never asked for, praise I never sought.

RomanceFates_Wyll_82.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_82.text: But you? You've earned the right to be called 'hero' a thousand times over. What a gift you've been to the Sword Coast.

RomanceFates_Wyll_118.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_118.text: And what a gift you've been to me. What an honour to walk alongside a true legend.

RomanceFates_Wyll_268.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_268.text: Come. The next page in our saga begins.

RomanceFates_Wyll_79.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_79.text: Let's do it, then. I'll join you in the Hells and help kill Mizora.

RomanceFates_Wyll_267.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_267.text: So be it. The next we meet, my blade will stained with Mizora's blood.

RomanceFates_Wyll_58.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_58.text: All I can ask then is - wait for me. If you can't, if you won't, then know this:

RomanceFates_Wyll_176.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_176.text: I can't. I just can't, Wyll. All I want is to see the sky one last time.

RomanceFates_Wyll_33.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_33.text: I can't force you, Karlach. And if you'd rather go now - here - I suppose I have no choice but to respect it, though it breaks my heart in two.

RomanceFates_Wyll_13.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_13.text: No, it's too dangerous. Zariel's forces would crush us.

RomanceFates_Wyll_205.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_205.text: Then we die proud, knowing we braved the Hells to slay the fiend who held my leash.

RomanceFates_Wyll_134.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_134.text: But I have faith in me, in us. We'll cut Mizora to ribbons before she can so much as groan Zariel's name.

RomanceFates_Wyll_253.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_253.text: And what of Mizora's warlocks? We'd be disrupting their lives.

RomanceFates_Wyll_200.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_200.text: So be it. They'd lose nothing but power they hadn't yet gained. I'm not worried for them.

RomanceFates_Wyll_227.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_227.text: I'm worried for every desperate soul Mizora will recruit to the Blood War, every life she snuffs out on Zariel's whims.

RomanceFates_Wyll_281.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_281.text: I want you to join me. I want you to live, Karlach. We can have a life together, even in Avernus. A real life.

RomanceFates_Wyll_98.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_98.text: I couldn't be more ready. Let's descend to the Hells and kill Mizora.

RomanceFates_Wyll_159.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_159.text: You know I can't go back. Zariel would crush me without a thought. I'd rather die here, at home, than in the Hells.

RomanceFates_Wyll_229.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_229.text: If we're meant to die, then let's do it together. Doing something worth dying for - hunting devils.

RomanceFates_Wyll_216.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_216.text: Don't throw your life away, Karlach. Not like this.

RomanceFates_Wyll_255.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_255.text: I am the Blade of Frontiers. I swore to protect the Coast from the monsters that prey on it. And I know my first target:

RomanceFates_Wyll_62.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_62.text: You've made me a new man.

RomanceFates_Wyll_266.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_266.text: I'm the Blade of Avernus. I swore to cleanse the Hells of the devils that threaten the Coast.

RomanceFates_Wyll_180.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_180.text: I am the Blade of Frontiers. I swore to protect the Coast from the monsters that prey on it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_86.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_86.text: I want you to join me. Warriors, lovers, guardians. Two champions as one.

RomanceFates_Wyll_50.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_50.text: A reasonable person would say 'no'. I still want you to say 'yes'.

RomanceFates_Wyll_89.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_89.text: Are you sure you're ready? Mizora drained you of your powers.

RomanceFates_Wyll_60.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_60.text: Of course I'll join you. I thought you'd never ask!

RomanceFates_Wyll_63.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_63.text: *You detect the slightest hint of sorrow behind Wyll's words. The hellish fate that awaits him is never far from his mind.*

RomanceFates_Wyll_173.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_173.text: Of course I'll join you. I thought you'd never ask!

RomanceFates_Wyll_149.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_149.text: These are your battles to fight, not mine. But I'll always be here for you when you return.

RomanceFates_Wyll_137.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_137.text: Heh - I was selfish to ask. And even more selfish, to be disappointed by your answer.

RomanceFates_Wyll_1.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_1.text: And what a gift you've been to me, to keep our flame burning even when the winds of change threaten to blow it out.

RomanceFates_Wyll_151.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_151.text: Come, rest with me tonight. And next I see you, may that flame be raging even stronger.

RomanceFates_Wyll_238.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_238.text: I can't, Wyll, not while Mizora pulls the strings.

RomanceFates_Wyll_128.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_128.text: The eternal burden of my pact. I certainly couldn't expect you to shoulder it too.

RomanceFates_Wyll_171.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_171.text: I want you to join me. I want you to live, Karlach. We can have a life together, even in Avernus. A real life.

RomanceFates_Wyll_212.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_212.text: If you're by my side, I can do it. All right Wyll. We'll return to Avernus.

RomanceFates_Wyll_168.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_168.text: That is... how are you feeling, darling? You look... peaked.

RomanceFates_Wyll_236.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_236.text: Not good. I don't have long now.

RomanceFates_Wyll_220.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_220.text: Karlach... is there really no other way? Now that you've reached the end of the line, do you still refuse to return to Avernus? To live?

RomanceFates_Wyll_19.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_19.text: Raphael's set his sights on Zariel's throne. She'll be too busy fighting him to pursue you.

RomanceFates_Wyll_194.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_194.text: Anything for you, my love. Together, we'll cut the Hells in two. And Zariel will never lay a hand on you - I swear it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_8.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_8.text: All right, Wyll. All right. I'll go.

RomanceFates_Wyll_187.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_187.text: I can't, Wyll. I can't go back. I'd rather die here, in my home, than go back there. All I want is to see the sky one last time.

RomanceFates_Wyll_113.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_113.text: I'd rather die in my home than live - barely - in the place I hate.

RomanceFates_Wyll_73.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_73.text: Oh, my love. I wish I could understand. But I respect your wishes. If this is your time, I will stand by your side.

RomanceFates_Wyll_47.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_47.text: Maybe you're right. Maybe I should go back.

RomanceFates_Wyll_104.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_104.text: You won't be alone. I need to set Baldur's Gate to rights after this disaster, but once she's stable, I could join you. Hunt out devils - real devils - together.

RomanceFates_Wyll_201.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_201.text: I'm fine. Let's talk about the future.

RomanceFates_Wyll_143.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_143.text: What future, Karlach? A future without you in it is no future at all. Is there really no other way?

RomanceFates_Wyll_264.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_264.text: Now that you've reached the end of the line, do you still refuse to return to Avernus? To live?

RomanceFates_Wyll_72.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_72.text: Try to contain the inferno threatening to consume you.

RomanceFates_Wyll_18.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_18.text: I see it in your eyes. The time is near.

RomanceFates_Wyll_271.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_271.text: I'd parade you through the streets if I could. 'The illithid who saved Baldur's Gate', the bards would cry - and you would take your rightful place at the side of Grand Duke Wyll Ravengard.

RomanceFates_Wyll_71.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_71.text: A beautiful fantasy. If only I could wish it into being.

RomanceFates_Wyll_34.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_34.text: The people of Baldur's Gate will accept a devil as a duke - but they'd never accept his mind flayer consort.

RomanceFates_Wyll_10.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_10.text: They would never see you as the hero I know you to be. They would only see a mind flayer.

RomanceFates_Wyll_193.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_193.text: I love you. But I can't be with you. Not the way I wanted.

RomanceFates_Wyll_15.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_15.text: You promised yourself to me for an eternity...

RomanceFates_Wyll_241.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_241.text: I meant it. And I still do.

RomanceFates_Wyll_217.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_217.text: So that's it? You'd just throw me away after the sacrifice that I made?

RomanceFates_Wyll_27.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_27.text: We'll make a place for you in the undercity, a secluded corner of your own. I'll bring you anything you need - robes, books... sustenance. You'll be safe.
RomanceFates_Wyll_27.context: NodeContext: Sustenance = brains, so a bit of hesitation there

RomanceFates_Wyll_210.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_210.text: I'll visit as often as I can. We can still dance, we can still write a story, we can still be us.

RomanceFates_Wyll_91.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_91.text: This doesn't have to be the end.

RomanceFates_Wyll_24.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_24.text: I'd like that. Let's do it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_163.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_163.text: Gods, you're so wonderful, my heart's near to bursting.

RomanceFates_Wyll_147.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_147.text: What a gift you've been to me. What an honour to know a true legend.

RomanceFates_Wyll_28.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_28.text: It pains me to know you must live this half-life, hidden in shadows when you deserve to bask in the Sword Coast's sun.

RomanceFates_Wyll_233.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_233.text: But it warms me to know you'll be near.

RomanceFates_Wyll_190.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_190.text: *Your mind turns to the future. Does happiness lurk in the bowels of the city? Does it lurk anywhere at all for one stuck in the skin of a monster?*

RomanceFates_Wyll_242.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_242.text: *But in one thought, you find comfort: you don't have to face tomorrow alone.*

RomanceFates_Wyll_237.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_237.text: It's not what I wanted, but I'm willing to give it a try.

RomanceFates_Wyll_139.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_139.text: I won't go back to the Undercity. Not after I know all the horrors I wrought there as the Temple's leader.

RomanceFates_Wyll_31.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_31.text: I think it's better if I'm on my own.

RomanceFates_Wyll_206.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_206.text: I was selfish to ask you to live a half-life as an underground plaything for a duke. And even more selfish, to be disappointed by your answer.

RomanceFates_Wyll_103.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_103.text: An uneasy life awaits you. But know this:

RomanceFates_Wyll_247.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_247.text: Wherever you go, you take my heart with you. So strong is my love that not even a devil could break it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_182.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_182.text: *Your mind turns to the future. Where will you go, and how will you feed? Can you ever find stability stuck in the skin of a monster?*

RomanceFates_Wyll_52.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_52.text: *Yet of one thing, you are most certain: whatever comes next, you'll face it alone.*

RomanceFates_Wyll_183.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_183.text: Sod off. I don't want to be your dirty little secret.

RomanceFates_Wyll_88.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_88.text: I cured the Urge. I want a free future, even if I look like this.

RomanceFates_Wyll_155.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_155.text: For the first time, I have a future. I want to share it with you.

RomanceFates_Wyll_114.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_114.text: I understand. Your duty is to the city.

RomanceFates_Wyll_68.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_68.text: It is. But that doesn't mean I have to discard you like a rotted carcass.

RomanceFates_Wyll_259.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_259.text: Please, Wyll - we can make this work.

RomanceFates_Wyll_280.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_280.text: Of course we can. And I know just how to do it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_270.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_270.text: I'd venture into the wilds with you at my side, if I could. 'The illithid who saved Baldur's Gate', I would cry, and the people would greet you as the hero I know you to be.

RomanceFates_Wyll_130.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_130.text: A beautiful fantasy. If only I could wish it into being.

RomanceFates_Wyll_6.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_6.text: The people I'm sworn to protect will see only an illithid. They would cower in fear - or worse yet, try to fill you with arrows and daggers.

RomanceFates_Wyll_46.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_46.text: You promised yourself to me for an eternity...

RomanceFates_Wyll_262.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_262.text: So that's it? You'd just throw me away after the sacrifice that I made?

RomanceFates_Wyll_61.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_61.text: I cured the Urge. I want a free future, even if I look like this.

RomanceFates_Wyll_25.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_25.text: For the first time, I have a future. I want to share it with you.

RomanceFates_Wyll_35.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_35.text: I understand. Your duty is to the Sword Coast.

RomanceFates_Wyll_214.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_214.text: Please, Wyll - we can make this work.

RomanceFates_Wyll_78.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_78.text: We'll make a place for you - somewhere secluded, somewhere you can call home.

RomanceFates_Wyll_22.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_22.text: I'll bring you anything you need - robes, books... sustenance. You'll be safe.

RomanceFates_Wyll_53.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_53.text: I'd like that. Let's do it.

RomanceFates_Wyll_120.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_120.text: But it warms me to I can always find you, dance with you, in the years to come.

RomanceFates_Wyll_83.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Wyll_83.text: *Your mind turns to the future. Does happiness lurk in the remote corners of the Coast? Does it lurk anywhere at all for one stuck in the skin of a monster?*

RomanceFates_Wyll_178.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_178.text: It's not what I wanted, but I'm willing to give it a try.

RomanceFates_Wyll_165.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_165.text: I won't go back to the Undercity. Not after I know all the horrors I wrought there as the Temple's leader.

RomanceFates_Wyll_97.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_97.text: I think it's better if I'm on my own.

RomanceFates_Wyll_38.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_38.text: I was selfish to ask you to live a half-life as a plaything for the Blade of Avernus. And even more selfish, to be disappointed by your answer.

RomanceFates_Wyll_185.speaker: Wyll
RomanceFates_Wyll_185.text: I was selfish to ask you to live a half-life as a plaything for the Blade of Frontiers. And even more selfish, to be disappointed by your answer.

RomanceFates_Wyll_172.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Wyll_172.text: Sod off. I don't want to be your dirty little secret.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_80.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_80.text: It feels so good. Freedom - true freedom. Finally.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_141.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_141.text: I can feel my strength growing. Every day that passes, I gain new abilities.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_13.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_13.text: And you've changed too, of course. A... different aesthetic, but with such power.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_13.context: NodeContext: 'different' - player is a mind flayer now. Astarion's not impressed with the look, but is very hungry for their power

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_43.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_43.text: A shame. I was looking forward to having you as my consort. But we can still be powerful allies.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_167.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_167.text: Yes. We will be powerful allies.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_167.context: NodeContext: Astarion's taking the player in, liking the potential in them

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_142.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_142.text: Allies? I thought we were friends. More than friends, even.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_181.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_181.text: Haha! Oh darling, please. I can't have something like this as my lover. The mechanics alone...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_150.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_150.text: No, a simple alliance is far more useful to us both.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_144.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_144.text: I can build up my power here in the light, while you lurk below in the shadows.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_243.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_243.text: Very well. If that's what you want.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_253.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_253.text: Oh, don't be like that. You can't have thought we'd stay together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_24.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_24.text: It would never work, sweetie. Not when I look like this and you... well, you're monstrous.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_93.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_93.text: And it's such a pity, because you were beautiful. You would have looked magnificent ruling by my side.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_177.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_177.text: But just because you're a monster, it doesn't mean we don't have a glorious future ahead of us.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_260.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_260.text: So come on, darling. Let's show this world what monsters can do.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_260.context: NodeContext: [Note - this is one of the last lines you can say to the player.]

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_197.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_197.text: True, we could help each other.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_67.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_67.text: Exactly my thought! Together, we can rule this city, and the cattle won't even realise it's happening.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_114.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_114.text: You'd discard me, just like that?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_168.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_168.text: I'm offering you a chance to be useful - to be more than the monster you've become. I thought you'd be grateful.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_54.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_54.text: But if you won't accept my kindness, that's on your slimy head.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_21.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_21.text: It is a shame, though. You were something special.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_137.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_137.text: I'll never forget the person you used to be - the beauty I bedded, the warrior I fought beside, the hero that saved this city.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_51.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_51.text: The people may not appreciate you now that you're a grotesque freak, but I do.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_25.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_25.text: After all, you helped me attain perfection. I owe all of this to you, so... thank you.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_149.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_149.text: Now get the hells out of my city.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_149.context: NodeContext: [Note - this is one of the last lines you can say to the player]

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_20.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_20.text: I don't think so. I have my own plans.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_91.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_91.text: Excuse me? What plans? Lurking in the sewers, feasting on rat brains?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_256.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_256.text: But fine - if you want to make your own future, have at it. And if you crash and burn, that's on your slimy head.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_164.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_164.text: Yes, I can work below the surface - you can work above.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_236.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_236.text: No. I am beyond your petty power games.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_0.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_0.text: Excuse me? These are the only games worth playing.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_47.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_47.text: But fine. You don't need my friendship and I don't need you sliming around my palace.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_39.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_39.text: I am no longer your spawn. I will choose my own path.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_111.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_111.text: Really? And what does your path include? Lurking in the sewers, feasting on rat brains?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_135.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_135.text: A pity you won't be here to see it.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_190.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_190.text: My love, stuck with this ticking time bomb in your chest. It's nothing short of a tragedy.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_55.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_55.text: Like I'm going to blow at any minute.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_31.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_31.text: It's too soon - we need more time together. You need to live your life, damn it.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_31.context: NodeContext: Realising Karlach is going to die, not really accepting it.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_259.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_259.text: So return to the Hells and do it - live.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_209.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_209.text: After all, Raphael's gone to wage war against Zariel. She'll be too busy fighting him to come after you.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_214.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_214.text: I'd - I'd even come with you. We can cut our way through the Hells together.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_214.context: NodeContext: Hesitates a moment, but then commits.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_255.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_255.text: You can't, Astarion. Avernus is a hellscape - literally.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_143.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_143.text: Oh, I've heard. But isn't that part of the fun? Bringing chaos to a whole new realm?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_218.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_218.text: Not to mention, I am the Vampire Ascendant. Where else could I find a worthy challenge?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_261.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_261.text: All right. I'll do it. Back to the Hells - together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_88.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_88.text: Why not? Life wouldn't taste half as sweet without you by my side.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_49.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_49.text: No - I swore I'd never go back, and I meant it. I just want to see the sky one last time.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_188.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_188.text: Very well, then. Die if you want to, I will carry on regardless.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_188.context: NodeContext: A little aloof, but not angry or cruel

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_66.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_66.text: I will miss you, though. Since the moment we met, you have been spectacular.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_40.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_40.text: I will see you again, my love. I'm not sure how, but if I know anything, it's that death isn't always the end.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_34.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_34.text: Who knows - perhaps we've only just begun.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_151.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_151.text: Concentrate. You can barely hear him through the blaze of chaos threatening to explode from within.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_222.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_222.text: Karlach? I asked how are -... No. Not your engine.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_222.context: NodeContext: Rudely asking "Karlach? I asked how are you feeling?" but then realises what's wrong - the engine in her chest is overheating and will kill her.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_160.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_160.text: You know, now that our enemies have fallen, I might be the most powerful person in the world.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_234.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_234.text: And as you're my consort, that makes us the most powerful people in the world.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_100.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_100.text: And that makes us the most powerful couple in the world.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_174.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_174.text: I wouldn't want it any other way.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_27.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_27.text: And neither would I. Together, we can do anything.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_231.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_231.text: The world is ours for the taking. So, what would you like?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_63.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_63.text: I want to see the world, with you at my side.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_23.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_23.text: Then you shall. We'll travel the lands together, tasting everything Faerûn has to offer.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_263.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_263.text: Perhaps we'll find somewhere we'd like to stay for a century or two - perhaps not.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_74.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_74.text: I want to live forever. Make me a vampire.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_35.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_35.text: My sweet, I thought you'd never ask.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_211.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_211.text: Of course, you will be a spawn before you can become a true vampire, but that's a small detail.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_2.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_2.text: Then we'll do it tonight. And come the morning, we will be together forever.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_72.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_72.text: We have a beautiful, bloody future to look forward to, my love. I can't be sure what it holds for us, but I know one thing.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_96.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_96.text: This is going to be fun.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_96.context: NodeContext: With a wicked smile [Note - this is one of the last lines you can say to the player. Make it count :P]

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_75.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_75.text: And you promise you'll make me a full vampire soon?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_180.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_180.text: My darling, of course! I want nothing more.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_180.context: NodeContext: overly sincere - he doesn't really mean it

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_252.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_252.text: Actually, no. This isn't what I want.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_196.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_196.text: This isn't what you want yet. I'm sure you'll come around in your own good time.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_117.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_117.text: But until the moment's right, we can still be together. We can still taste all the delights of this world.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_11.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_11.text: We'll start with Baldur's Gate - Let's make this city ours.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_185.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_185.text: Oh, darling. I love the way you think.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_173.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_173.text: We will need to be careful, of course. There are still powerful forces in the city.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_119.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_119.text: Not least of whom is our friend, the new Grand Duke.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_7.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_7.text: Let's put our enemies to the sword!

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_217.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_217.text: Just when I thought I couldn't love you any more.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_248.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_248.text: I think we should break up.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_258.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_258.text: Hahaha! Don't be stupid, darling. You're mine, remember?
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_258.context: NodeContext: Genuine laugh - the player can't get away from him. Not even if they want to.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_178.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_178.text: The tadpole is gone, which means your future is mine to decide.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_250.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_250.text: How lucky you are that I chose you as my consort. Chose you to help me take Baldur's Gate, then sit by my side as I rule it.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_195.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_195.text: There's no backing out now - we'll be together forever. I can promise you that.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_207.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_207.text: Excuse me? You want to leave - now? At my moment of triumph? Have you lost your mind?!
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_207.context: NodeContext: Trying to grasp what's just been said

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_140.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_140.text: You stupid, ungrateful, little- Fine. Fine! To hells with you, I'll take Baldur's Gate myself.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_140.context: NodeContext: Manages to rein in his rage, but is still very tense

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_22.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_22.text: I don't need you - I don't need anyone. I already have everything I want.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_165.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_165.text: As for you... I wish you well. I'm sure you'll land on your feet.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_165.context: NodeContext: trying to get on the high horse

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_77.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_77.text: Perhaps we'll even meet again someday. The future is yet to be written, after all.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_77.context: NodeContext: Not a threat, but not NOT a threat

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_136.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_136.text: So let's put our new-found power to use.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_166.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_166.text: My love. You always know the right thing to say.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_235.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_235.text: I wouldn't subdue the world in Bhaal's name - I'll subdue it in ours.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_3.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_3.text: Really? Because Shadowheart has the ear of a literal god.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_232.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_232.text: True, she could be a threat.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_57.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_57.text: I don't know - Wyll's a Grand Duke. That's pretty powerful...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_113.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_113.text: True, he has a lot of power at his fingertips. He could be a threat.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_125.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_125.text: I don't know - Wyll's the Blade of Avernus. Pretty powerful...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_99.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_99.text: True, if he ever branches out from fighting the Infernal, he'd be a formidable threat.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_33.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_33.text: The Absolute may be gone, but others will rise against us. Maybe even our old allies.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_33.context: NodeContext: Reflective on the last line

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_130.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_130.text: We may need a purge or two. Just to secure our position.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_254.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_254.text: We're not killing our friends, Astarion!

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_122.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_122.text: Well of course I don't want to. But if they get in my way...
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_122.context: NodeContext: "of course I don't WANT to kill our friends. But..."

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_262.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_262.text: Let's hope they have more sense than that.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_12.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_12.text: Anyway, taking power in this city will need to be a subtle process. We wouldn't want to spook the cattle, after all.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_112.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_112.text: We can start slowly - quietly charming and manipulating key figures, building up our network of puppets.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_127.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_127.text: Before long we'll have our hands on every string in this city, and they will dance however we tell them to.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_194.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_194.text: Why not go somewhere new? It's a big world out there.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_94.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_94.text: It is indeed. We can travel the lands together, tasting everything Faerûn has to offer.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_133.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_133.text: You could make me a vampire. Then we'd be even stronger together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_238.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_238.text: Why stop at two? We could bring this city to its knees.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_228.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_228.text: I was just thinking about freedom.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_220.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_220.text: How I'm free of Cazador. How I have a whole new life stretching out in front of me, and you're-...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_95.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_95.text: How neither one of us is free. How Cazador's still out there, and you're-...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_105.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_105.text: Well, what are you? Is the person I loved still in there?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_153.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_153.text: I'm glad. Although I'm not sure what the expectations are around... us?
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_153.context: NodeContext: Genuinely glad. 'us' referring to your relationship together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_201.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_201.text: Do you still want to be together?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_239.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_239.text: As much as I want to, I'm not sure if I can.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_154.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_154.text: I don't know, it is a big change. And as much as I care for you... I don't know.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_233.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_233.text: Maybe it's better if we're friends for now? You're precious to me and I don't want to lose you, but this is a lot.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_97.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_97.text: Perhaps we'll adjust, perhaps we won't, but you mean too much for me to walk away.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_202.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_202.text: So would I. And I hope we can find some place for love in our new - whatever this is.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_104.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_104.text: But even if we can't, I'll never forget the person you were. I'll never forget what you did for this world.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_37.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_37.text: Maybe it's better if we part.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_84.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_84.text: A pity, because we were rather excellent together. A love for the ages...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_10.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_10.text: I'll never forget you. I'll never forget what you did for this world.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_62.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_62.text: And what you did for me.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_139.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_139.text: Thank you, my love. Thank you.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_139.context: NodeContext: [Note - this is one of the last lines you can say to the player. Make it count :P]

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_241.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_241.text: I don't think that would be right for either of us.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_148.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_148.text: No, I think you're right. It's probably best to leave things here.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_76.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_76.text: I am, but I'm more than that. I have evolved beyond the person I was.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_189.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_189.text: I see. And how does this newly-evolved version of you feel about me?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_79.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_79.text: I shed that person when I shed their skin.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_101.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_101.text: How I'm free of Cazador. How I have a whole new life stretching out in front of me, and you... you won't be able to join me, will you?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_212.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_212.text: It isn't fair. Not after everything we've been through.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_169.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_169.text: It isn't fair. It just... is what it is.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_116.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_116.text: Maybe, but life is what you make it. And I want to make mine with you.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_6.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_6.text: You can't want to die like this, Karlach. Not when you could still go back to the Hells. Not when you could still live.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_158.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_158.text: And if we did it together - if I came with you - who knows what we'd achieve?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_90.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_90.text: I mean it, this is what I want. And it's the smart move.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_179.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_179.text: Think about it: in the Hells I never have to fear the sun, I can kill anyone I want, and I'll be with you.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_145.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_145.text: Are you sure about this? The Hells are a horrific place.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_107.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_107.text: Don't threaten me with a good time, darling.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_156.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_156.text: I swore I'd never go back. I haven't changed my mind.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_170.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_170.text: This would be different, Karlach. Together, we can face anything - no matter what Avernus throws at us.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_60.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_60.text: And Zariel will be far too busy with Raphael to worry about scouring the plane for you.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_106.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_106.text: Plus, Cazador could search for a thousand years and never find me there.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_32.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_32.text: So, Karlach... What do you say?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_59.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_59.text: Then what are we waiting for, darling?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_46.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_46.text: I just can't, Astarion. I'd rather die here, in my home, than try to survive the Hells. I just want to see the sky one last time.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_147.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_147.text: All right. If that's what you want.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_147.context: NodeContext: Just heard that his love is determined to let herself die, rather than fighting on in Hell

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_159.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_159.text: But you won't get rid of me so easily, my love. Death isn't always the end of life - that much I know for certain.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_159.context: NodeContext: Still processing his love's impending death

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_229.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_229.text: Who knows - perhaps we've only just begun.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_229.context: NodeContext: Still processing his love's impending death

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_200.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_200.text: Then you'd better live that new life of yours to the fullest. Live enough for both of us.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_5.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_5.text: And I intend to. I can go anywhere, do anything, indulge in whatever hedonism or carnage I like. Once I stay out of the sun.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_103.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_103.text: So I was thinking; where can I go that is devoid of sunlight, filled with violence, and has the one person I want to spend all my time with?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_225.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_225.text: You still have a life to live. Embrace it, my love.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_162.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_162.text: Say nothing. Concentrate on keeping the inferno inside you from boiling over.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_56.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_56.text: I see what's happening, Karlach. The end is coming. But it doesn't have to look like this.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_171.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_171.text: How neither one of us is free. How Cazador's still out there - how you're... you're coming to the end, aren't you?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_210.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_210.text: How I'm free of the parasite - free of Cazador. How I'll never be in someone's power again.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_28.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_28.text: We've dealt with the parasite. And you dealt with Cazador. I'll never be in someone's power again.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_245.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_245.text: And all it cost was my life in the sun. Now I belong to the shadows.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_203.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_203.text: We make a good team - let's go be heroes together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_208.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_208.text: We are rather good together, aren't we? I never saw myself as a hero, but fighting alongside you has been special.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_152.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_152.text: Maybe we could make a difference out there. Although, I do need to ask...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_175.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_175.text: We should find the vampire spawn in the Underdark. They'll need guidance.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_204.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_204.text: True, the spawn will need someone to lead them. Otherwise they'll just be a murderous, blood-sucking horde.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_223.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_223.text: Although, I couldn't help but notice you said 'we' should find them.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_52.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_52.text: I'll help you find a way to walk in the sun again.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_215.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_215.text: You - do you think it's possible? I suppose there is a chance.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_71.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_71.text: And if there's a chance, no matter how small, I'm going to take it.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_110.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_110.text: And it would mean setting off on another adventure together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_17.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_17.text: Is that what you want? Is this what you want?
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_17.context: NodeContext: "This" referring to "us being in a relationship". Maybe with a "you and me" hand gesture.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_29.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_29.text: Let's settle down somewhere and enjoy the peace.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_221.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_221.text: That does sound tediously boring. Although, if it's with you... maybe?

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_19.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_19.text: And I'm sure trouble would find us sooner or later. It always seems to.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_65.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_65.text: I just need to be sure - is this what you want? I mean... this.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_65.context: NodeContext: "This" referring to "us being in a relationship". Maybe with a "you and me" hand gesture.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_186.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_186.text: I might be free of the parasite, but Cazador's still out there. Without the tadpole's protection, he just has to find me to claim me.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_249.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_249.text: It might be days or years, but he'll come for me eventually. He's inevitable.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_118.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_118.text: When the time comes, we'll kill him together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_41.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_41.text: True, if we can kill a Netherbrain, we can kill anything.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_163.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_163.text: Why wait? Let's go kill him.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_89.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_89.text: It's more of a gamble without the tadpoles, but maybe you're right. The best defence is a timely murder...

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_193.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_193.text: Let's leave Baldur's Gate. He can't control you if he can't find you.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_18.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_18.text: True, it's a vast world out there; there are plenty of places to hide.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_182.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_182.text: Are you sure you want to do this, though? I mean... this?
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_182.context: NodeContext: "This" referring to "us being in a relationship". Maybe with a "you and me" hand gesture.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_16.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_16.text: I would understand if you wanted to go your own way.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_132.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_132.text: No, this is what I want.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_38.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_38.text: Being free to choose love, choose a new family - that is my own way.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_240.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_240.text: Good, because selfless as I am, I really did not want to let you go.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_26.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_26.text: Eh, let's see what happens. Life is a big adventure.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_14.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_14.text: It certainly is when you're around.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_138.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_138.text: We are rather excellent together, you know. And united, there is nothing we can't do.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_9.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_9.text: I can't say what the future holds for us, but I know we'll be facing it together.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_123.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_123.text: And we're going to have a lot of fun.
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_123.context: NodeContext: [Note - this is one of the last lines you can say to the player. Make it count :P]

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_30.speaker: Player
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_30.text: Actually, I will go and do my own thing.

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_44.speaker: Astarion
ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_44.text: You - what? I didn't think you'd actually agree!

ROM_RomanceFates_Astarion_115.speaker: Astarion
