RomanceFates_Shadowheart_199.context: NodeContext: Speaking of a romance that can no longer be. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_275.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_275.text: I am glad for the time we had together. There is much I still cannot truly remember, but I will never forget you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_275.context: NodeContext: Speaking of a romance that can no longer be. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_272.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_272.text: So, your sect is taking advantage of the vulnerable?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_243.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_243.text: Such an aggressive choice of words - careful you don't spoil the moment. Besides, we give them a home, purpose - just like I received.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_243.context: NodeContext: Raised eyebrow, a little defensive. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_103.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_103.text: A flame cannot burn without fuel, and Lady Shar's church would not thrive if everyone was happy and content. We are nothing but a dark mirror, held up to show society's failings.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_103.context: NodeContext: Reasoning, persuasive. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_125.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_125.text: Perhaps you'll come to realise that, in time. If you do, you know where the House of Grief is, and what lies beneath it. We all need to be unburdened, every now and again.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_125.context: NodeContext: Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_253.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_253.text: Do you ever think maybe things could have turned out differently?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_85.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_85.text: Of course things could have been different, but nothing says they would have been better. I fulfilled my destiny, just as Lady Shar wished me to.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_85.context: NodeContext: Arc: A little thrown by the question. Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_216.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_216.text: That's not to say there aren't parts I wished were different... but I suppose that's how you know when you've done something of value - when you know what you sacrificed to achieve it.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_216.context: NodeContext: Wistful. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_113.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_113.text: I understand. You can't stave off oblivion forever. At least not here.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_113.context: NodeContext: Solemn. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_51.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_51.text: Could you not return to the Hells? Wait this out, find a cure...?
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_51.context: NodeContext:  Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_232.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_232.text: I... I think the voice inside you will guide you to where you need to be. Mine called me to Lady Shar. And yours...? Well, only you can know for sure.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_232.context: NodeContext: Accepting. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_24.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_24.text: I can't, I'm sorry. My place is here. Lady Shar needs me. Her children need me.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_24.context: NodeContext: Grave, sincere. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_121.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_121.text: I'll never go back - I'm sorry. I just want to see the sky one more time before I go.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_202.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_202.text: I can respect that. The same end awaits us all. At least you can ensure the final moments are on your own terms.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_202.context: NodeContext: Solemn, supportive. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_237.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_237.text: Come. Let's get you some fresh air. I'll stay with you, right until the end.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_237.context: InternalNodeContext: Needs to end with them going outside for Karlach to die.NodeContext: Solemn, supportive. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_132.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_132.text: The heat inside you is overwhelming. Try to contain it.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_137.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_137.text: You look off-colour. It's your engine, isn't it? Oblivion beckons at last.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_137.context: NodeContext: Concerned. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_183.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_183.text: Seems you're fond of making exceptions. Remember that night in the courtyard?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_143.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_143.text: How could I forget? A pleasant, vivid memory - but now I have to move on.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_143.context: NodeContext: A little playful, but switches to business at the end. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_83.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_83.text: What if you just... didn't take up your place?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_134.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_134.text: The only reason for that would be if I had died in battle. Did I seem dead to you, last night?
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_134.context: NodeContext: Reaffirming she's dedicated to Shar and can't be with the player. Insinuation about the night before in 'did I seem dead...?' Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_156.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_156.context: NodeContext: Playful. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_198.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_198.text: You know what I mean. Forget Shar. Stay with me.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_69.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_69.text: You are adorable, though perhaps a little inattentive.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_69.context: NodeContext: Flattered. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_130.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_130.text: That's one thing I'm good at. Or so I understand.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_130.context: NodeContext: Wry. Arc: Shadowheart remained loyal to Shar, ultimately sacrificing (and subsequently forgetting) her parents, before assuming control over Shar's church.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_82.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_82.text: I was afraid for the briefest moment when I woke this morning. I didn't know where I was - I thought perhaps it had all been a dream... stopping the Absolute, saving my parents.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_82.context: NodeContext: Contemplative/voicing an irrational fear. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_108.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_108.text: Then I realised I was in your arms. We did it. Everything's perfect.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_108.context: NodeContext: Relief/happiness. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_167.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_167.context: NodeContext: Silver of doubt. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_213.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_213.text: She can try to twist the knife all she likes - I know I can survive her worst. Nothing she does can sour the fact that I have my family again.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_213.context: NodeContext: Resolve/tough cookie. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_117.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_117.text: You deserve to be happy - all of you.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_258.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_258.text: I wanted to ask about us. We had a connection, you and I.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_27.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_27.text: What did you have in mind?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_41.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_41.text: Perhaps we shouldn't - it might just reopen old wounds.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_3.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_3.text: *You try to focus on Shadowheart's words, but the inferno inside is burning your mind clean.*

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_36.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_36.text: I suppose in a way, you finally finished the journey your parents set you upon.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_234.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_234.text: The coming-of-age rite? Yes, I suppose I did... though I doubt they realised I'd get lost for years when they sent me into the woods...
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_234.context: NodeContext: Thoughtful/appreciating the irony, Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_59.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_59.text: But I made it in the end.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_59.context: NodeContext: Content. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_80.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_80.text: You cried out in your sleep once.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_84.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_84.text: Almost? I can give it another try if you like...

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_62.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_62.text: Last night was... an experience. But I don't think you've changed quite as much as some might think. I'd recognise that vigour anywhere.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_62.context:
NodeContext: Playful/morning after.
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_218.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_218.text: It sounds like the city's trying to get back on its feet already. Normal life is returning... which means things are about to become decidedly more difficult for you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_218.context:
NodeContext: Thoughful/'life goes on'
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_278.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_278.text: Perhaps you could wear a mask - say you're a leper, or have taken religious vows to conceal your face.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_278.context:
NodeContext: Spitballing ideas/Appraising the player. Trying to figure out how they can keep going, in their mindflayer form.
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_50.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_50.text: Who would do such a thing for religion?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_100.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_100.text: I don't know - it's hardly practical, but when has that ever stopped someone from trying to please their god of choice? I would know.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_100.context:
NodeContext: Recognises that she's clutching at straws
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_138.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_138.text: It would be too much of a risk, though. One mishap, one busybody, and you could be surrounded by a mob.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_138.context:
NodeContext: Facing a hard truth
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_38.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_38.text: After what this city's been through, people will scarcely tolerate cuttlefish at the fishmonger's stall - never mind a full-blown mind flayer in their midst.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_38.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_162.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_162.text: Do you know what this means?
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_162.context:
NodeContext: Tender, regretful
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_88.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_88.text: It means life as I knew it is over. But at least I have a life.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_214.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_214.text: All those people you saved... most of them will never know what you did. But you know, and so do I. I'll never forget.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_214.context:
NodeContext: A little angry and impassioned at the player's unfair fate
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_135.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_135.text: I need to get you out of here. It was difficult enough smuggling you in here, covered in cloaks. It'll only get worse as normalcy returns.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_135.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_142.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_142.text: Is this how we part ways?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_6.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_6.text: I think so, yes. At least for now.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_6.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_10.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_10.text: I can't. Lady Shar needs me. Her children need someone to lead them - my place is with them.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_10.context:
NodeContext: Arc: SH stayed with Shar and sacrificed her parents.
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_204.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_204.text: You are in charge - you get to decide. Join me, at least for a while.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_200.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_200.text: I... I suppose I should encourage independence amongst the Dark Lady's flock - Viconia held us in too tight a grip. I don't want to make that same mistake.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_200.context: NodeContext: Conceding. Perhaps she doesn't need to part ways with her mind flayer lover just yet.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_224.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_224.text: Very well. There are many ways to serve Lady Shar - the cloister can wait. And who is to say what useful secrets I might stumble upon with a travelling companion such as yourself?
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_224.context: NodeContext: Conceding. Perhaps she doesn't need to part ways with her mind flayer lover just yet.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_40.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_40.text: Besides, I think I'm due a sabbatical.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_169.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_169.text: If you wish, perhaps you can still come to see me, now and again. I have a hidden place, close to the cloister, where night orchids bloom. If you ever wish to see me, go there.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_169.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_20.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_20.text: May Lady Shar's darkness cloak you and shield you. You will find few friends in the light of day, but you can still count on me.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_20.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_264.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_264.text: You need not go on without me. I can be discreet. We can find a way.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_86.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_86.text: That would call for an awful lot of discretion, you know. Enough to make even a former Sharran take pause...

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_28.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_28.text: ...but after all we've been through, I really should know better than to doubt you, shouldn't I?
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_28.context: NodeContext: Conceding a little. Maybe they CAN make it work

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_47.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_47.text: All right - let's try. We've gotten this far, after all. Just... let me do the explaining, to my parents. They've been through a lot - I'd rather they didn't die of shock.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_47.context: NodeContext: Throwing caution to the wind. Maybe she CAN make it work with her monster lover. A little playful at the end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_265.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_265.text: All right - let's try. We've gotten this far, after all. Just... let me do the talking. You'd be amazed what a pretty face can get away with.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_265.context: NodeContext: Throwing caution to the wind. Maybe she CAN make it work with her monster lover. A little playful at the end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_165.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_165.text: You need to take care of yourself, keep out of danger. Perhaps... perhaps there is some way, some unfathomable way we can still see each other, eventually.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_165.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_49.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_49.text: Such a thing must exist, surely... so I refuse to call this farewell. Just 'until next time'.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_49.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_252.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_252.text: I can't. My parents... I need to be with them now. I'm sorry.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_252.context:
NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar and saved her parents
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_67.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_67.text: I can't... at least not right now. I'm sorry. After everything that happened with my parents, with Shar, I need time to myself. Time to find myself.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_67.context:
NodeContext: Arc: SH abandoned Shar and euthanised her parents
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_235.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_235.text: I can't, I'm sorry. We may have saved the world, but I have unfinished business to take care of. I don't want to jeopardise you while I look for my place in this world.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_235.context:
NodeContext: Fallback line - SH's arc was not conclusively resolved.
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_8.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_8.text: You stood by me when Bhaal possessed me... We have faced so much worse together...

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_227.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_227.text: We have. And our luck held, despite everything. But we can't rely on that forever. I won't roll the dice, day after day, if your life is on the line.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_227.context: NodeContext: Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_201.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_201.text: This city owes me - it must accept me.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_91.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_91.text: By rights, yes. Unfortunately, though, people's fears and hatreds are not so logical. They'd cheer as they burned their saviour on a pyre. I won't stand by and let that happen.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_91.context:
NodeContext: A little angry and impassioned at the player's unfair fate
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_153.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_153.text: I fear so, but I want to hear you say it. Then, I know it will be real.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_240.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_240.text: You deserve to be vaunted, adored. Statues in your image should stand on every square. A whole generation of babies should be named in your honour... but it will not be so.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_240.context:
NodeContext: A little angry and impassioned at the player's unfair fate
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_73.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_73.text: For a time, perhaps. Deception and concealment has been part of my life for so long... but this is different. This is beyond me.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_73.context:
NodeContext: Recognises that she's clutching at straws
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_160.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_160.text: I cannot conceal what I am.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_101.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_101.text: No... and I wouldn't ask you to, in truth. You're living proof of the sacrifice you made... but I fear others may not see it that way.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_101.context:
NodeContext: Recognises that she's clutching at straws
Shadowheart spent the night with her lover, who transformed themselves into a mind flayer in order to save the world. Bittersweet parting of ways between lovers who can no longer easily be together.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_114.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_114.text: Last night was perfect. Saving the world is quite the aphrodisiac.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_114.context: NodeContext: Pleased. Shadowheart's personal storyline was not fully resolved, and she reaches the conclusion of the game at something of a loose end. She resolves to pursue her own concerns now, and gently suggests the relationship with the player is at an end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_78.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_78.text: Well... we may have put a stop to the Absolute and rid ourselves of the tadpoles... but too many of my own concerns went untended as a result.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_78.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet. Morning after one last night together with love interest player. Shadowheart's personal storyline was not fully resolved, and she reaches the conclusion of the game at something of a loose end. She resolves to pursue her own concerns now, and gently suggests the relationship with the player is at an end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_173.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_173.text: Now I must try to rectify that, see to my own affairs. Little point in saving the world only to have no clear place in it afterwards.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_173.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet. Morning after one last night together with love interest player. Shadowheart's personal storyline was not fully resolved, and she reaches the conclusion of the game at something of a loose end. She resolves to pursue her own concerns now, and gently suggests the relationship with the player is at an end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_197.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_197.text: This is something I have to do for myself. What we shared was special to me... but I think our paths diverge from here on.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_197.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet. Morning after one last night together with love interest player. Shadowheart's personal storyline was not fully resolved, and she reaches the conclusion of the game at something of a loose end. She resolves to pursue her own concerns now, and gently suggests the relationship with the player is at an end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_14.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_14.text: But who knows? Perhaps we'll meet again. Though hopefully not after being abducted. Be good. And if you can't be good... just don't get caught.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_14.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet. Morning after one last night together with love interest player. Shadowheart's personal storyline was not fully resolved, and she reaches the conclusion of the game at something of a loose end. She resolves to pursue her own concerns now, and gently suggests the relationship with the player is at an end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_98.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_98.text: In truth? Conflicted. We may have put a stop to the Absolute and rid ourselves of the tadpoles... but too many of my own concerns went untended as a result.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_98.context: NodeContext: A little bittersweet. Morning after one last night together with love interest player. Shadowheart's personal storyline was not fully resolved, and she reaches the conclusion of the game at something of a loose end. She resolves to pursue her own concerns now, and gently suggests the relationship with the player is at an end.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_75.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_75.context: NodeContext: Pleased, morning after saving the world. Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_99.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_99.text: Though... I couldn't help lying there, thinking about my parents, before you stirred.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_99.context: NodeContext: Solemn note. Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_191.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_191.text: I gave them the release they asked for, freed myself from Shar's grasp, just as they wished for... but there's moments where I think I'd trade that to be able to see them again, talk to them again.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_191.context: NodeContext: 'I did what was right but I wish I feel better for it' Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_112.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_112.text: There's so much only they could have told me. But that's all gone now - I've got to move on, find some place for myself.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_112.context: NodeContext: Some regret. Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_55.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_55.text: You'll find what you need. I'm sure of it.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_168.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_168.text: I think so, yes. It's just up to me to recognise it when it's in front of me...
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_168.context: NodeContext: Glimmer of inner peace. Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_93.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_93.text: I don't know exactly what lies ahead for me, but at least now I can choose my own path. With you at my side, if you wish.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_93.context: NodeContext: Hopeful, tentative. Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_241.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_241.text: I was hoping you'd say that. Whatever lies ahead will be far less daunting if I have you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_241.context: NodeContext: Glad. Glimmer of inner peace.  Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_107.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_107.text: It could be just like old times... Well, hopefully not exactly like old times. I think I've had enough camping and mortal peril for one lifetime.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_107.context: NodeContext: Warm, glimpse of playfulness.  Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_189.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_189.text: You need time to find yourself, first. What we have can wait.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_23.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_23.text: Perhaps that's wise... I'm still figuring out who I am. Unfair to ask you to commit to an unknown quantity.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_23.context: NodeContext: Understanding.  Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_266.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_266.text: But after I've found some inner peace, who knows? I'll keep myself easy to find, if you wish to track me down.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_266.context: NodeContext: Forward-looking. Keeping the door half-open for love interest.  Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_209.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_209.text: We need to move on - separately.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_9.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_9.text: I see... Well, if you change your mind, I'll keep myself easy to find.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_9.context: NodeContext: A little disappointed. Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_219.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_219.text: There's a place for you by my side, if you want it.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_74.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_74.text: *You try to focus on Shadowheart's words, but the inferno inside is burning your mind clean.*

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_256.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_256.text: Shadowheart... I love you... but my engine... it's time...

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_247.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_247.text: No... we've only just put everything behind us, won the chance to be together... It can't end like this. I won't let it.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_247.context: NodeContext: Devastated/unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_172.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_172.text: The heat inside you is overwhelming. Try to hold it in. Try to respond.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_12.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_12.text: Karlach? You look poorly... It's the engine, isn't it? It's burning out.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_12.context: NodeContext: Realisation/dread. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_1.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_1.text: You need to return to Avernus. Look for a cure, fight on - whatever it takes. Just don't give up.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_1.context: NodeContext: Unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_30.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_30.text: Plus Raphael will have Zariel distracted. You can be free of her.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_30.context: NodeContext: Unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_260.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_260.text: I want to be by your side. If that means joining you in the Hells, so be it.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_260.context: NodeContext: Determined/romantic. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_32.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_32.text: If you're sure. I'll return to the Hells with you. We'll make a new life - a different life.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_106.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_106.text: I'm sure. If there's a cure to be found, we'll track it down. And if not, I'll still have you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_106.context: NodeContext: Determined/romantic. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_194.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_194.text: No, Shadowheart. You deserve a better life than that. And so do I.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_141.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_141.text: I'll never go back - I'm sorry. I just want to see the sky one more time before I go.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_271.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_271.text: I... I thought we could have so much more together. But this is your choice.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_271.context: NodeContext: Heartbroken but respecting of lover's dying wish. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_161.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_161.text: I'll never be able to fill the place by my side where you should be standing. And I'll never forget you. Not a single moment.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_161.context: NodeContext: Heartbroken but respecting of lover's dying wish. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_208.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_208.text: Come, let's go outside. Some fresh air will do you good. And I'll be with you the entire time.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_208.context: NodeContext: Heartbroken but respecting of lover's dying wish. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_7.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_7.text: Ah, dead parents. The perfect post-coital subject.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_43.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_43.text: Sorry. Thought I'd catch you in the afterglow.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_43.context: NodeContext: Wry, Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_39.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_39.text: More than I thought would be possible, considering the short time we had...
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_39.context: NodeContext: Wistful. Overall arc: Shadowheart mercy-killed her parents in order to end Shar's control over them and her.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_196.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_196.text: Last night was perfect. Almost perfect.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_196.context: NodeContext: Warm. Flicker of self doubt on 'almost perfect'. Shadowheart abandoned Shar at the last minute and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_205.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_205.text: After everything that happened - with my parents, with Shar - I didn't think I was owed any happiness. I did things. Things that fill me with shame now.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_205.context: NodeContext: Bittersweet. Her redemption's not been without difficulties. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_152.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_152.text: There's at least one person who doesn't want me happy - Shar. I felt the wound last night, while you were sleeping. Like some sadistic child, de-winging a fly.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_152.context: NodeContext: Resolute. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_175.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_175.text: She only wants to spoil things - don't let her. You deserve to be happy.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_131.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_131.text: Thank you. Sometimes I have to remind myself of that very thing - it's nice to hear someone else say it.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_131.context: NodeContext: Grateful for the player's support. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_33.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_33.text: You and I... our time together has been very dear to me. I had hoped maybe there might be more to come.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_33.context: NodeContext: Tentative, hopeful. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_222.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_222.text: You spited a goddess. It's understandable that she's feeling vengeful.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_212.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_212.text: Let her rage on. She may be able to hurt me, but she can't control me - not anymore.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_212.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_61.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_61.text: You're right. I can always rely on you to say the right thing.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_61.context: NodeContext: Appreciative. Shadowheart abandoned Shar at the last minute and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_5.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_5.text: It's not an exciting life that I lead, but I'd like you to be a part of it. I doubt I'd have anything at all if it wasn't for you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_5.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_157.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_157.text: Good. Then seek me out, when you have time. I'm hoping to find some place I can settle down and stay close to my parents. Somewhere quiet, where they can find peace, and gaze at the night sky...
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_157.context: NodeContext: Glad, looking to the future. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_193.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_193.text: I'll keep a spot for you. It'll be just like old times.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_193.context: NodeContext: Warm. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_150.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_150.text: What did you have in mind?

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_71.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_71.text: I'm hoping to find some place I can settle down and stay close to my parents. Somewhere quiet, where they can find peace, and gaze at the night sky...
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_71.context: NodeContext: Glad, looking to the future. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_279.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_279.text: If that sounds at all appealing, then I'll keep a spot for you. It'll be just like old times.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_279.context: NodeContext: Warm. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_238.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_238.text: Perhaps we shouldn't - it might just reopen old wounds.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_233.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_233.text: I'm adept at dealing with old wounds, trust me. But if you don't want to... well, I won't force you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_233.context: NodeContext: A little disappointed, but understanding. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_60.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_60.text: But I'll keep myself easy to find, in case you change your mind. You may come to miss me yet.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_60.context: NodeContext: Keeping the door half open for love interest. Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_269.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_269.text: *You try to focus on Shadowheart's words, but the inferno inside is burning your mind clean.*

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_263.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_263.text: Shadowheart... I love you... but my engine... it's time...

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_276.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_276.text: No... we've only just put everything behind us, won the chance to be together... It can't end like this. I won't let it.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_276.context: NodeContext: Devastated/unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_109.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_109.text: The heat inside you is overwhelming. Try to hold it in. Try to respond.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_77.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_77.text: Karlach? You look poorly... It's the engine, isn't it? It's burning out.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_77.context: NodeContext: Dread/realisation. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_123.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_123.text: You need to return to Avernus. Look for a cure, fight on - whatever it takes. Just don't give up.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_123.context: NodeContext: unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_139.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_139.text: I could come with you, once I've taken care of my parents. They'll understand; they've always had each other. They'd want us to be happy.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_139.context: NodeContext: Unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_111.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_111.text: Plus Raphael will have Zariel distracted. You can be free of her.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_111.context: NodeContext: Unwilling to let go. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_26.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_26.text: You don't know what you're saying. Avernus is the worst possible place for you to end up.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_207.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_207.text: The worst place to end up is anywhere that doesn't let you be at my side.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_207.context: NodeContext: Determined/romantic. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_76.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_76.text: If you're sure. I'll return to the Hells with you. We'll make a new life - a different life.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_195.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_195.text: I'm sure. If there's a cure to be found, we'll track it down. And if not, I'll still have you.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_195.context: NodeContext: Determined/romantic. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_53.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_53.text: No, Shadowheart. You deserve a better life than that. And so do I.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_176.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_176.text: Tell your parents I said farewell. And that they're very lucky to have a daughter like you.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_29.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_29.text: I couldn't let you do that.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_225.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_225.text: You're hardly in a position to stop me, given how weak you are.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_225.context: NodeContext: Determined/romantic. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_159.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_159.text: Yes. Yes. Yes! Ahem. If you're sure.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_37.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_37.text: I'll never go back - I'm sorry. I just want to see the sky one more time before I go.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_273.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_273.text: I... I thought we could have so much more together. All of us. But this is your choice.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_273.context: NodeContext: Heasrtbroken, but respectful of lover's dying wish. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_89.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_89.text: I'll never be able to fill the place by my side where you should be standing. And I'll never forget you. Not a single moment.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_89.context: NodeContext: Heasrtbroken, but respectful of lover's dying wish. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_17.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_17.text: Come. Let's get you some fresh air. I'll stay with you, right until the end.
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_17.context: NodeContext: Heasrtbroken, but respectful of lover's dying wish. Speaking to Karlach, her lover who is going to die because of an infernal engine burning up inside her. Arc: Shadowheart abandoned Shar and saved her parents

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_34.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_34.text: You cried out in your sleep last night.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_267.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_267.text: I know. It was her - Shar. Using the wound to hurt me, out of pure spite.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_158.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_158.text: Almost? I can give it another try, if you like.

RomanceFates_Shadowheart_110.speaker: Shadowheart
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_110.text: I didn't mean it like that...
RomanceFates_Shadowheart_110.context: NodeContext: Sigh/gentle brush-off of player's ribald joke

SoloFates_Shadowheart_10.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_10.text: *Quiet, at last. The din of battle has ceased. The voice of the Netherbrain has been silenced.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_7.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_7.text: *In the days to come, the dead will be buried, rubble will be cleared, and life will go on. For the city, and for you.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_5.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_5.text: *For the first time in too long, you can afford to dream of the future. So what shall it be?*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_0.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Shadowheart_0.text: You are Lady Shar's right hand. Your place is wherever she commands you to be.

SoloFates_Shadowheart_15.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_15.text: *Your authority is new - untested. Perhaps there will be dissent to quash, examples to be made. And once your place is secure, who knows...?*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_16.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_16.text: *There are many in the city and beyond who are in desperate need of Lady Shar's embrace. You shall help them, of course. And relish every moment of it.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_11.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Shadowheart_11.text: You are free from Shar's grasp, but at the cost of your parents. Perhaps you can find peace where this all began.

SoloFates_Shadowheart_20.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_20.text: *There is a dark forest out there somewhere. A place where a frightened little girl became Shadowheart. You must seek it out, and when you find it, offer a prayer for your parents.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_14.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Shadowheart_14.text: A quiet life, perhaps. With your parents close at hand. You have a lot of lost time to make up for.

SoloFates_Shadowheart_3.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_3.text: *For too long, you thought the only family you had was the one Shar forced upon you. But now you know the truth. Now you can reconnect, and heal - together.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_2.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_2.text: *A long time ago, you never came home. Now is the time to correct that.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_17.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Shadowheart_17.text: A quiet life, perhaps. With your parents close at hand. You have a lot of lost time to make up for.

SoloFates_Shadowheart_4.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Shadowheart_4.text: Take a break. See perhaps if you can find someone to spend the nights with...

SoloFates_Shadowheart_6.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_6.text: *Who wouldn't want to spend some time with the saviour of Baldur's Gate? Oh the stories you could tell them...*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_1.speaker: Player
SoloFates_Shadowheart_1.text: Who says it's too soon to strike out on another adventure? There's a whole world - and more - out there to explore...

SoloFates_Shadowheart_9.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_9.text: *Your mother and father are in no fit state for a life on the road... but once they have somewhere they can be comfortable, and you take care to visit often, what harm...?*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_21.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_21.text: *Besides, there are some adventures you wouldn't want your parents to know about.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_12.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_12.text: *Think of all the places where people live in ignorance of Lady Shar's teachings... it is nothing less than your solemn duty to usher them towards her embrace.

SoloFates_Shadowheart_8.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_8.text: *And if you should enjoy yourself in the process, well, what harm...?*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_19.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_19.text: *Your parents wanted you to live your life on your own terms. This is how you can honour their memory.*

SoloFates_Shadowheart_18.speaker: Narrator
SoloFates_Shadowheart_18.text: *That's it settled then - you'll strike out once again, and see what the roads untravelled reveal to you. Hard to abandon the adventuring life, once you gain a taste for it...*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_28.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_28.text: *As you awaken, your naked form aches with the exertions of coupling. Its effusions mingle with the cesspool around you.*
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark urge waking up. They are naked and filthy - covered in mud. They are in the SEWER area of ENDddddddddddddd

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_30.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_30.text: *The Urge has congealed in your mind and made of you a beast: a feral carcass with but a twitching knife-arm.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_19.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_19.text: When will it end? When will it end?

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_9.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_9.text: Father, I vow to thee: the call to coupling bewitches my loins, and I shall heed it.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_18.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_18.text: *Bhaal has use left for you. Following your failure, a new duty swelled within you:*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_4.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_4.text: *Sire a new legion of Bhaalspawn, and set them upon self-slaughter. Your progeny must succeed where you fell.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_7.speaker: b82532ed-4966-4c4a-88b3-58ef9df6b0b6
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_7.text: Rah. Hrrhn. You mate well. Mate like will die soon.
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Worg waking up and turning around to the Dark Urge beside them.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_16.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_16.text: *With your holy mission came the power to commune with the beasts.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_11.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_11.text: Take pride, you may have bred a new Bhaalspawn.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_3.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_3.text: *Your memory of last night's act is absent. In the moment of mounting, your mind emptied itself, and you could think only of Bhaal.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_25.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_25.text: *The gnoll's rump seemed to become his Temple's graven altar where you once led worship.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_17.speaker: b82532ed-4966-4c4a-88b3-58ef9df6b0b6
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_17.text: Quit stirring. Want sleep. Done with mate.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_20.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_20.text: *Bhaal demands the birth of a horde.*
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_20.context: CinematicNodeContext: worg starting to get frustrated

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_8.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_8.text: *On your back in your septic nest, were you to encounter fifty a night, it would still not be enough.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_22.speaker: b82532ed-4966-4c4a-88b3-58ef9df6b0b6
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_22.text: Leave. Never see again. You not gnoll. Will not be litter.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_1.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_1.text: Think me not a slave to mere nature: the children will be most beautiful.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_2.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_2.text: *So you wander out alone to the rancid wastes, looking for the next creature who will accept your diseased embrace.*
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge starts out walking upright, but as the next three narrator nodes go on and they get further into the darkness of the sewers, they get more and more crouched, like they've forgotten how to be a humanoid. ALTERNATIVE: they start to walk away, but as their urge drives them on, they begin to jog and then run, getting more excited and compelled

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_29.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_29.text: *What delights will you plumb next? Displacer beasts? Worgs? Carrion-crawlers?*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_24.speaker: Narrator
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_24.text: *Thus you shall spend the rest of your days rutting, the lash of Father's disappointment the only thought in your rat's mind.*

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_6.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_6.text: New creatures will be grafted... such is the power of the Divine Essence.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_26.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_26.text: My lust is not yet sated.

RomanceFates_DarkUrge_10.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_DarkUrge_10.text: I feel the burning within me. If you cannot fulfil it, I must depart to seek a new brood-partner.

Remembrance_72.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_72.text: Affairs of the heart. One one side, love. The other, grief.

Remembrance_20.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_20.text: There is one among you who is missing.

Remembrance_120.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_120.text: One whose journey has been every bit as rich as thine own.

Remembrance_211.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_211.text: One whose life shone much too brightly for this world.

Remembrance_22.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_22.text: One who made the greatest sacrifice of all.

Remembrance_176.speaker: Player
Remembrance_176.text: He saved us all, but at what cost?

Remembrance_158.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_158.text: |He did the right thing/he shouldn't have done it - whatever this companion would say about Gale blowing himself up.|

Remembrance_92.text: |Poor/brave/selfless/whatever this companion would say about Gale. We owe him a debt we'll never be able to repay.|

Remembrance_82.speaker: Player
Remembrance_82.text: I hope he's at peace, wherever he is.

Remembrance_136.speaker: Player
Remembrance_136.text: I thought I'd never hear the end of his ramblings.

Remembrance_89.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_89.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_56.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_56.text: He saved many. But there was one he could not save - Karlach.

Remembrance_232.speaker: Player
Remembrance_232.text: If it wasn't for Gortash, she'd still be with us.

Remembrance_68.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_68.text: |At least he got what he deserved (had his head exploded by the brain OR been killed by us directly.|

Remembrance_8.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_8.text: A sad death indeed, no less tragic for the fact that it was pre-ordained.

Remembrance_43.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_43.text: But take heart, such a spirit as she had will not be snuffed.

Remembrance_237.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_237.text: We have space enough to hold for her. And we will hold it.
Remembrance_237.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shot of fire - it flares, evoking Karlach.

Remembrance_86.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_86.text: |May her flame burn forever bright, wherever she is.|

Remembrance_146.text: But we must hold space for one other.

Remembrance_178.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_178.text: A prince who overcame his nature to become the thing he most despised.

Remembrance_156.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_156.text: A prince who sacrified all that he was, all that he stood for, all to save his people.

Remembrance_161.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_161.text: |His death was honourable. And yet - I mourn him still.|

Remembrance_185.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_185.text: True heroes do not die in death.

Remembrance_28.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_28.text: Though thou may mourn his mortal passing, his legacy lives on.

Remembrance_59.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_59.text: It is forever written in past, present - and future.

Remembrance_111.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_111.text: In his people. In his home.
Remembrance_111.context: CinematicNodeContext: Pan up to stars - a comet if we can.

Remembrance_101.speaker: Shadowheart
Remembrance_101.text: |A shame to have lost the princebut better to die a hero than live a monster|

Remembrance_215.context: CinematicNodeContext: A rustle of sound in nearby shrubbery. Companions look around, suspicious. Perhaps one reaches for a weapon. A mind flayer steps into the firelight.

Remembrance_112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind flayer joins the campfire.

Remembrance_143.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_143.text: |It's been a while... how have you been?|

Remembrance_203.context: CinematicNodeContext: Mind flayer starts a mind meld with the gathered group. No tadpoles anymore, but relying on a shared sense of hivemind created by having survived this adventure together. Stills/artwork rather than fully animated scenes.

Remembrance_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Flashback/shared vision: We see the mind flayer having retreated into the shadows of the city (like the Emperor did in his INT_EmperorRevealed_AfterOrpheus flashback).

Remembrance_180.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see the mind flayer consuming the minds of criminals (like the Emperor did).

Remembrance_133.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see the mind flayer doing a good deed. Reuse anim MFL_M_Rig_SCENE_END_IthdOptAsml_TadpoleHandover to have mind flayer hand an apple/fruit/food to a starving child.

Remembrance_168.context: CinematicNodeContext: We see the Flaming Fists catching sight of the mind flayer and attacks/pursues it. The mind flayer manages to escape and retreats back into the shadows. Fade back to campfire scene.

Remembrance_198.speaker: Lae'zel
Remembrance_198.text: |It's good to see you, old friend + additional nodes if needed for reactivity to the mindmeld of what the player mind flayer has been up to.|

Remembrance_160.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_160.text: Thou hast had quite the journey. And thou wilt - no doubt - have more.

Remembrance_234.context: CinematicNodeContext: Companions group around mind flayer / raise a glass to it / otherwise bond in communical activity.
