Remembrance_179.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_179.text: Though he hath departed from our midst, he did not leave thee without one final word of parting.

Remembrance_248.context: CinematicNodeContext: Withers magically manifests hologram Gale.

Remembrance_193.text: Well met! I am a magical projection of Gale of Waterdeep, and if you see this manifestation, that means I have prematurely perished.

Remembrance_208.text: And this time, I'm sorry to say, there's no coming back.

Remembrance_33.text: But no tears, friends. I hope that my sacrifice was meaningful - that the world is a safer place, and that you have found happiness.

Remembrance_53.text: Truly, I wish I could be there with you.

Remembrance_213.text: But now, I voyage elsewhere, on unknown currents, through unknown realms. One with the Weave. One with the infinite.
Remembrance_213.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hologram fades out into astral/Weave/infinite space.

Remembrance_70.speaker: Jaheira
Remembrance_70.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_34.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
Remembrance_34.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_134.speaker: Wyll
Remembrance_134.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_97.speaker: Shadowheart
Remembrance_97.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_186.speaker: Astarion
Remembrance_186.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_192.speaker: Minsc
Remembrance_192.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_31.speaker: Halsin
Remembrance_31.text: |How dare you speak ill of him! We owe him our lives.|

Remembrance_243.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_243.text: Thou would speak ill of one who made such sacrifice? Of one to whom thou owest thy life?

Remembrance_152.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_152.text: But after sacrifice comes rebirth. Tell me, what hast thou made of thyself?

Remembrance_224.speaker: Withers
Remembrance_224.text: But there is one among you who is missing...

RomanceFates_Laezel_125.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_125.text: By any account, I should have slit you open from scalp to stomach and watched you drain.

RomanceFates_Laezel_80.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_80.text: You made me betray Orpheus, son of Gith, prince of the githyanki.

RomanceFates_Laezel_25.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_25.text: But you are zhak vo'n'fynh duj. First, you inflict my wounds. Then with burning breath, you close them.
RomanceFates_Laezel_25.context: NodeContext: ZHACK VOHN-fin DOO - source of my bruises

RomanceFates_Laezel_47.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_47.text: Last night will be forever branded into my memory -

RomanceFates_Laezel_43.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_43.text: - but now I must think of future days.

RomanceFates_Laezel_124.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_124.text: I am forever marked by Vlaakith. The Undying Queen's knights will chase me across Faerûn 'til I draw my final breath.

RomanceFates_Laezel_29.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_29.text: Our lives will be coloured by blood-red and death-black. Are you ready for the battles to come?

RomanceFates_Laezel_7.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_7.text: I wouldn't want it any other way. We're together now.
RomanceFates_Laezel_7.context: InternalNodeContext: SH subnodes for shar/anti-shar path

RomanceFates_Laezel_99.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_99.text: Yes. A bond so tight, Vlaakith would unleash the Astral Sea's fury if she every tried to break it.

RomanceFates_Laezel_66.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_66.text: When the red dragons come, we will shake the skies with their screams. The ground will be soaked and spoiled wherever the kith'raki fall.

RomanceFates_Laezel_81.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_81.text: Let Vlaakith's forces come. I will send them to their graves.

RomanceFates_Laezel_49.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_49.text: Yes! The skies will shake from the red dragon's screams. The ground will be soaked and spoiled wherever the kith'raki fall.

RomanceFates_Laezel_9.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_9.text: We will not be their prey. They will be ours!

RomanceFates_Laezel_21.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_21.text: Our days will be many, our bond ever stronger, as long as we hew together.

RomanceFates_Laezel_19.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_19.text: Come. Let's make this day count - and all the ones to follow.

RomanceFates_Laezel_33.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_33.text: Hells - talk of battle's set my heart beating all over again.

RomanceFates_Laezel_63.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_63.text: Back to bed. I have more tricks to show you...

RomanceFates_Laezel_85.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_85.text: I'm sorry, but that's not the life I want. This is where our paths diverge.

RomanceFates_Laezel_56.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_56.text: What kind of life might that be, in this ghaik form you now suffer?

RomanceFates_Laezel_42.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_42.text: Bah - what does it matter? You implored me to stay with you, only to reject me.

RomanceFates_Laezel_34.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_34.text: You implore me to stay with you, only to reject me? Chk. To think I cared for such a coward.

RomanceFates_Laezel_115.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_115.text: Forget it. You're on your own.

RomanceFates_Laezel_15.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_15.text: A thousand wounds inflicted, and you couldn't resist opening this last one.

RomanceFates_Laezel_109.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_109.text: So strong was our bond, the Astral Sea rippled in concord.

RomanceFates_Laezel_77.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_77.text: So strong is the bond's breaking, that it now shakes in turmoil.

RomanceFates_Laezel_40.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_40.text: Good-bye. My first love and my last.

RomanceFates_Laezel_18.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_18.text: My life will be coloured by blood-red and death-black. I face many battles to come. And I would ask you to join me.

RomanceFates_Laezel_75.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_75.text: You would stay with me, even though I look like... this?

RomanceFates_Laezel_93.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_93.text: Quite simply: yes. I was stained by Vlaakith's lies. Without you, I'd never have been cleansed of them.

RomanceFates_Laezel_1.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_1.text: Just - give me time to get used to the tentacles. And the head. But mostly the tentacles.

RomanceFates_Laezel_32.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_32.text: Of course. Together, we'll face the coming onslaught.

RomanceFates_Laezel_71.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_71.text: If it means a chance to know you even better, I'm all in.

RomanceFates_Laezel_31.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_31.text: Rain death on your enemies and blood-wine on our flesh, and there is every chance.

RomanceFates_Laezel_41.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_41.text: Our days will be many, our bond ever stronger, as long as we hew together.

RomanceFates_Laezel_116.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_116.text: Come. Let's make this day count - and all the ones to follow.

RomanceFates_Laezel_48.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_48.text: Orpheus has fallen. My life will be coloured by blood-red and death-black. I must prepare for the battles to come.

RomanceFates_Laezel_52.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_52.text: Let me come with you. We can defeat Vlaakith's forces together.

RomanceFates_Laezel_113.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_113.text: You'll get lonely. Maybe you'd like some company on your journey.

RomanceFates_Laezel_118.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_118.text: I am sure you'll make the best of it. But you'll do it without me.

RomanceFates_Laezel_105.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_105.text: Good luck, but you're on your own.

RomanceFates_Laezel_96.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_96.text: Chk. Did you think I'd ask you to join me?
RomanceFates_Laezel_96.context: NodeContext: A break up but not too harsh, still with fondness.

RomanceFates_Laezel_132.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_132.text: You let perish the Prince of the Comet, the True Heir of my people.
RomanceFates_Laezel_132.context: NodeContext: A break up but not too harsh, still with fondness.

RomanceFates_Laezel_8.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_8.text: That you wear the guise of a ghaik, I might have overlooked. That you stole Orpheus from his people? I could never.

RomanceFates_Laezel_28.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_28.text: This is good-bye. Not because I don't care for you - but because I do.

RomanceFates_Laezel_121.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_121.text: You are the source of my wounds. I will forever remember, and forever bleed.

RomanceFates_Laezel_68.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_68.text: An unforgiveable slight, to me - and to our bond.
RomanceFates_Laezel_68.context: NodeContext: A break up but not too harsh, still with fondness.

RomanceFates_Laezel_38.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_38.text: My life will be coloured by blood-red and death-black. I must prepare for the battles to come.

RomanceFates_Laezel_73.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_73.text: Let me come with you. We can defeat Vlaakith's forces together.

RomanceFates_Laezel_123.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_123.text: You look like ghaik - and even so, I might have said yes, had you further indulged my needs in the city.

RomanceFates_Laezel_107.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_107.text: I might have said yes, if you'd further indulged our obsessions.

RomanceFates_Laezel_117.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_117.text: You'll get lonely. Maybe you'd like some company on your journey.

RomanceFates_Laezel_5.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_5.text: Instead, you tasted me, tested me - and turned away when you'd had your fill.

RomanceFates_Laezel_69.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_69.text: You inflicted my wounds, and I inflicted yours. Some will stop hurting. But all of them will leave lasting marks.

RomanceFates_Laezel_92.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_92.text: Goodbye, zhak vo'n'fynh duj. You will not be forgotten.
RomanceFates_Laezel_92.context: NodeContext: ZHACK VOHN-fin DOO - source of my bruises

RomanceFates_Laezel_60.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_60.text: I am sure you'll make the best of it. But you'll do it without me.

RomanceFates_Laezel_101.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_101.text: As I expected. You indulged an obsession - you tasted me, tested me, and had your fill.

RomanceFates_Laezel_76.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_76.text: Good luck, but you're on your own.

RomanceFates_Laezel_103.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_103.text: Of course I am. You indulged an obsession - you tasted me, tested me, and had your fill.

RomanceFates_Laezel_72.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_72.text: Lae'zel. My engine... it's... it's finally burning me through.

RomanceFates_Laezel_84.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_84.text: Kaincha! No. Your journey does not end here.

RomanceFates_Laezel_50.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_50.text: Try to reply. Try to contain the inferno inside you.

RomanceFates_Laezel_23.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_23.text: Tsk'va! You are pallid. Your engine - it will soon break down completely if we don't act.

RomanceFates_Laezel_67.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_67.text: You are the saviour of the Sword Coast. You are the murderer of death itself. You are the source of my joy.

RomanceFates_Laezel_114.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_114.text: We are returning to Avernus. You will be well, and I will be by your side. Together, we will face the Hells, and Vlaakith besides, should she pursue us there. And we will thrive.

RomanceFates_Laezel_4.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_4.text: We are returning to Avernus. You will be well, and I will be by your side. Together, we will face the Hells. And we will thrive.

RomanceFates_Laezel_0.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_0.text: I can't let you do that, Lae'zel. Avernus is too horrible.

RomanceFates_Laezel_98.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_98.text: I would relish the opportunity to test my mettle upon the devils of Avernus.

RomanceFates_Laezel_62.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_62.text: It is Zariel who should tremble - not us.

RomanceFates_Laezel_122.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_122.text: If you really mean it, I'll go back with you.

RomanceFates_Laezel_97.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_97.text: Your sense is intact. Good. Let us go - before it's too late.

RomanceFates_Laezel_102.speaker: Player
RomanceFates_Laezel_102.text: No, Lae'zel. I swore I'd never go back, and I meant it. All I want now is to see the sky one more time.

RomanceFates_Laezel_82.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_82.text: Then a warrior's death it is. Come. I will stay by your side until the very last moment - source of my bruises.

RomanceFates_Laezel_126.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_126.text: Zhak vo'n'fynh duj. I'm sticky with sweat and the distant planes know what else.

RomanceFates_Laezel_88.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_88.text: First, you inflict my wounds. Then with burning breath, you close them. I have lost the thread between pain and pleasure.

RomanceFates_Laezel_26.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_26.text: Orpheus is dead - yet Vlaakith still marks me as traitor and prey.

RomanceFates_Laezel_6.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_6.text: Vlaakith's turned her back to me, and I to her. I am forever marked.

RomanceFates_Laezel_13.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_13.text: The Undying Queen's knights will chase me across Faerûn 'til I draw my final breath.

RomanceFates_Laezel_10.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_10.text: An illithid stands before me. My eyes show me a horror; my heart sees something more.

RomanceFates_Laezel_14.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_14.text: I see the conqueror who defeated the Netherbrain and ended its Grand Design.

RomanceFates_Laezel_91.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_91.text: I see the generous spirit who sacrificed everything so my people could be free.

RomanceFates_Laezel_16.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_16.text: I know who lives behind this ghaik disguise: the source of my bruises and the source of my joy -

RomanceFates_Laezel_111.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_111.text: - and the one with whom I'd spend my future days.

RomanceFates_Laezel_24.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_24.text: I see the conqueror who defeated the Netherbrain and ended its Grand Design.

RomanceFates_Laezel_128.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_128.text: But I also see the wretch who made me betray Orpheus, son of Gith, prince of the githyanki.

RomanceFates_Laezel_74.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_74.text: It's not your form that appals me. It's your contempt.

RomanceFates_Laezel_119.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_119.text: Now I must turn my thoughts to future days.

RomanceFates_Laezel_30.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_30.text: I see the conqueror who defeated the Netherbrain and ended its Grand Design.

RomanceFates_Laezel_108.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_108.text: And I see the source of my bruises. The one who earned my obsession and became my possession.

RomanceFates_Laezel_11.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_11.text: But that was the past. I must turn my attention to future days.

RomanceFates_Laezel_27.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_27.text: I abandoned my prince for you - and for a path of our making, away from the Astral.

RomanceFates_Laezel_55.speaker: Lae'zel
RomanceFates_Laezel_55.text: And yet I breathe all the more free. Little is lost, so much is gained.

GaleExplosionFinale_0.speaker: Player
GaleExplosionFinale_0.text: |The threat is gone but at what cost.|
GaleExplosionFinale_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sequence of showing the tadpoled people in the city being freed of their parasitev and mindlfayers connected to the Netherbrain dropping dead.
